016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator;
017
018import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.CuiMockComponent;
019import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.CuiMockRenderer;
020import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.CuiMockUIViewRoot;
021import de.cuioss.test.jsf.mocks.CuiMockViewHandler;
022import de.cuioss.test.valueobjects.objects.impl.DefaultInstantiator;
023import jakarta.faces.application.Application;
024import jakarta.faces.component.*;
025import jakarta.faces.component.behavior.ClientBehavior;
026import jakarta.faces.component.behavior.FacesBehavior;
027import jakarta.faces.component.html.*;
028import jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext;
029import jakarta.faces.convert.Converter;
030import jakarta.faces.convert.FacesConverter;
031import jakarta.faces.render.FacesRenderer;
032import jakarta.faces.render.Renderer;
033import jakarta.faces.validator.FacesValidator;
034import jakarta.faces.validator.Validator;
035import lombok.NonNull;
036import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
037
038import static de.cuioss.tools.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
039import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
040
041/**
042 * Helper class acting as runtime-registry for {@link UIComponent},
043 * {@link Converter}, {@link Validator} and {@link Renderer}
044 *
045 * @author Oliver Wolff
046 */
047@RequiredArgsConstructor
048public class ComponentConfigDecorator {
049
050    static final String FORM_RENDERER_ID = "jakarta.faces.Form";
051    static final String TEXT_RENDERER_ID = "jakarta.faces.Text";
052    static final String SELECT_BOOLEAN_RENDERER_ID = "jakarta.faces.SelectBoolean";
053    static final String SELECT_ONE_RENDERER_ID = "jakarta.faces.SelectOne";
054    private static final String BEHAVIOR_CLASS_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "behaviorClass must not be null";
055    private static final String BEHAVIOR_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "behaviorId must not be null";
056    private static final String RENDERER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "renderer must not be null";
057    private static final String RENDERER_TYPE_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "rendererType must not be null";
058    private static final String FAMILY_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "family must not be null";
059    private static final String VALIDATOR_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "validatorId must not be null";
060    private static final String CONVERTER_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "converterId must not be null";
061    private static final String TARGET_CLASS_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "targetClass  must not be null";
062    private static final String VALIDATOR_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "validator must not be null";
063    private static final String COMPONENT_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "component must not be null";
064    private static final String COMPONENT_TYPE_NOT_BE_NULL = "component must not be null";
065    private static final String CONVERTER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL = "converter  must not be null";
066
067    @NonNull
068    private final Application application;
069
070    @NonNull
071    private final FacesContext facesContext;
072
073    /**
074     * Adds add {@link Validator} to the given id.
075     *
076     * @param validatorId the id the {@link Validator} should be registered with,
077     *                    must not be null
078     * @param validator   the actual {@link Validator} class, must not be null.
079     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself in order to enable a
080     * fluent-api style usage
081     */
082    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerValidator(final String validatorId,
083                                                      final Class<? extends Validator> validator) {
084        requireNonNull(validator, VALIDATOR_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
085        requireNonNull(validatorId, VALIDATOR_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
086        application.addValidator(validatorId, validator.getName());
087        return this;
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * Adds add {@link Validator} the needed validatorId is retrieved from
092     * {@link FacesValidator}.
093     *
094     * @param validator the actual {@link Validator} class, must not be null.
095     *                  To work the {@link Validator} must provide the
096     *                  {@link FacesValidator} annotation to identify
097     *                  the needed validatorId
098     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
099     * fluent-api style usage
100     */
101    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerValidator(final Class<? extends Validator> validator) {
102        requireNonNull(validator, VALIDATOR_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
103        checkArgument(validator.isAnnotationPresent(FacesValidator.class),
104            "In order to work this method needs a validator annotated with 'jakarta.faces.validator.FacesValidator', validatorClass:"
105                + validator.getName());
106        return registerValidator(validator.getAnnotation(FacesValidator.class).value(), validator);
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Register a {@link Converter} for a given target class.
111     *
112     * @param converter   to be registered must not be null
113     * @param targetClass must not be null
114     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
115     * fluent-api style usage
116     */
117    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerConverter(final Class<? extends Converter> converter,
118                                                      final Class<?> targetClass) {
119        requireNonNull(targetClass, TARGET_CLASS_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
120        requireNonNull(converter, CONVERTER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
121        application.addConverter(targetClass, converter.getName());
122        return this;
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Register a {@link Converter} for a given target class.
127     *
128     * @param converter to be registered, must not be null and must provide a
129     *                  {@link FacesConverter} annotation for deriving targetType or
130     *                  converter-id
131     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
132     * fluent-api style usage
133     */
134    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerConverter(final Class<? extends Converter> converter) {
135        requireNonNull(converter, CONVERTER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
136        checkArgument(converter.isAnnotationPresent(FacesConverter.class),
137            "In order to work this method needs a converter annotated with 'jakarta.faces.convert.FacesConverter', converterClass:"
138                + converter.getName());
139        final var facesConverter = converter.getAnnotation(FacesConverter.class);
140        if (!Object.class.equals(facesConverter.forClass())) {
141            registerConverter(converter, facesConverter.forClass());
142        }
143        if (!facesConverter.value().isEmpty()) {
144            registerConverter(converter, facesConverter.value());
145        }
146        return this;
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Register a {@link Converter} to a given converterId.
151     *
152     * @param converter   to be registered must not be null
153     * @param converterId must not be null
154     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
155     * fluent-api style usage
156     */
157    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerConverter(final Class<? extends Converter> converter,
158                                                      final String converterId) {
159        requireNonNull(converterId, CONVERTER_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
160        requireNonNull(converter, CONVERTER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
161        application.addConverter(converterId, converter.getName());
162        return this;
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Registers a {@link UIComponent}
167     *
168     * @param componentType identifying the component must not be null
169     * @param component     the actual component must not be null
170     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
171     * fluent-api style usage
172     */
173    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerUIComponent(final String componentType,
174                                                        final Class<? extends UIComponent> component) {
175        requireNonNull(componentType, COMPONENT_TYPE_NOT_BE_NULL);
176        requireNonNull(component, COMPONENT_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
177        application.addComponent(componentType, component.getName());
178        return this;
179    }
180
181    /**
182     * Registers a {@link UIComponent}
183     *
184     * @param component the actual component must not be null must provide the
185     *                  {@link FacesComponent} annotation to derive the componentId
186     *                  to be registered to.
187     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
188     * fluent-api style usage
189     */
190    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerUIComponent(final Class<? extends UIComponent> component) {
191        requireNonNull(component, COMPONENT_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
192        checkArgument(component.isAnnotationPresent(FacesComponent.class),
193            "In order to work this method needs a UIComponent annotated with 'jakarta.faces.component.FacesComponent', component:"
194                + component.getName());
195        return registerUIComponent(component.getAnnotation(FacesComponent.class).value(), component);
196    }
197
198    /**
199     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockComponent} with a {@link CuiMockRenderer}.
200     *
201     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
202     * fluent-api style usage
203     */
204    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerCuiMockComponentWithRenderer() {
205        registerUIComponent(CuiMockComponent.class);
206        registerMockRenderer(CuiMockComponent.FAMILY, CuiMockComponent.RENDERER_TYPE);
207        return this;
208    }
209
210    /**
211     * Registers a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for the given attributes.
212     *
213     * @param family       identifying the component-family the renderer is related
214     *                     to, must not be null
215     * @param rendererType identifying the type of the renderer is related to, must
216     *                     not be null
217     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
218     * fluent-api style usage
219     */
220    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRenderer(final String family, final String rendererType) {
221        requireNonNull(family, FAMILY_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
222        requireNonNull(rendererType, RENDERER_TYPE_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
223        facesContext.getRenderKit().addRenderer(family, rendererType, new CuiMockRenderer());
224        return this;
225    }
226
227    /**
228     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for
229     * {@link HtmlOutputText}.
230     *
231     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
232     * fluent-api style usage
233     */
234    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForHtmlOutputText() {
235        registerMockRenderer(UIOutput.COMPONENT_FAMILY, TEXT_RENDERER_ID);
236        return this;
237    }
238
239    /**
240     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for
241     * {@link HtmlSelectBooleanCheckbox}.
242     *
243     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
244     * fluent-api style usage
245     */
246    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForHtmlSelectBooleanCheckbox() {
247        registerMockRenderer(UISelectBoolean.COMPONENT_FAMILY, SELECT_BOOLEAN_RENDERER_ID);
248        return this;
249    }
250
251    /**
252     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for
253     * {@link HtmlSelectOneRadio}.
254     *
255     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
256     * fluent-api style usage
257     */
258    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForHtmlSelectOneRadio() {
259        registerMockRenderer(UISelectOne.COMPONENT_FAMILY, SELECT_ONE_RENDERER_ID);
260        return this;
261    }
262
263    /**
264     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for
265     * {@link HtmlInputText}.
266     *
267     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
268     * fluent-api style usage
269     */
270    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForHtmlInputText() {
271        registerMockRenderer(UIInput.COMPONENT_FAMILY, TEXT_RENDERER_ID);
272        return this;
273    }
274
275    /**
276     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for {@link HtmlForm}.
277     *
278     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
279     * fluent-api style usage
280     */
281    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForHtmlForm() {
282        registerMockRenderer(UIForm.COMPONENT_FAMILY, FORM_RENDERER_ID);
283        return this;
284    }
285
286    /**
287     * Shorthand for registering a {@link CuiMockRenderer} for
288     * {@link HtmlCommandButton}.
289     *
290     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
291     * fluent-api style usage
292     */
293    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerMockRendererForCommandButton() {
294        facesContext.getRenderKit().addRenderer("jakarta.faces.Command", "jakarta.faces.Button",
295            new CuiMockRenderer("CommandButton"));
296        return this;
297    }
298
299    /**
300     * Registers a {@link Renderer}
301     *
302     * @param family       identifying the component-family the renderer is related
303     *                     to, must not be null
304     * @param rendererType identifying the type of the renderer is related to, must
305     *                     not be null
306     * @param renderer     the actual renderer to be registered, must not be null
307     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
308     * fluent-api style usage
309     */
310    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerRenderer(final String family, final String rendererType,
311                                                     final Renderer renderer) {
312        requireNonNull(family, FAMILY_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
313        requireNonNull(rendererType, RENDERER_TYPE_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
314        requireNonNull(renderer, RENDERER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
315        facesContext.getRenderKit().addRenderer(family, rendererType, renderer);
316        return this;
317    }
318
319    /**
320     * Registers a {@link Renderer} The family and rendererType will be derived by
321     * the mandatory {@link FacesRenderer} annotation
322     *
323     * @param renderer the actual renderer to be registered, must not be null, must
324     *                 provide {@link FacesRenderer} annotation and a no arg public
325     *                 constructor.
326     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
327     * fluent-api style usage
328     */
329    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerRenderer(final Class<? extends Renderer> renderer) {
330        requireNonNull(renderer, RENDERER_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
331        checkArgument(renderer.isAnnotationPresent(FacesRenderer.class),
332            "In order to work this method needs a Renderer annotated with 'jakarta.faces.render.FacesRenderer', renderer:"
333                + renderer.getName());
334        final Renderer instance;
335        instance = new DefaultInstantiator<>(renderer).newInstance();
336        final var config = renderer.getAnnotation(FacesRenderer.class);
337        return registerRenderer(config.componentFamily(), config.rendererType(), instance);
338    }
339
340    /**
341     * Register a {@link ClientBehavior} for a given behaviorId
342     *
343     * @param behaviorId    the id the {@link ClientBehavior} should be registered
344     *                      with, must not be null
345     * @param behaviorClass the actual type of the {@link ClientBehavior} must not
346     *                      be null
347     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
348     * fluent-api style usage
349     */
350    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerBehavior(final String behaviorId,
351                                                     final Class<? extends ClientBehavior> behaviorClass) {
352        requireNonNull(behaviorId, BEHAVIOR_ID_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
353        requireNonNull(behaviorClass, BEHAVIOR_CLASS_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
354        application.addBehavior(behaviorId, behaviorClass.getName());
355        return this;
356    }
357
358    /**
359     * Register a {@link ClientBehavior}. The behaviorId will be extracted by the
360     * mandatory {@link FacesBehavior} annotation
361     *
362     * @param behaviorClass the actual type of the {@link ClientBehavior} must not
363     *                      be null and provide the {@link FacesBehavior} annotation
364     *                      to extract the correct behaviorId
365     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
366     * fluent-api style usage
367     */
368    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerBehavior(final Class<? extends ClientBehavior> behaviorClass) {
369        requireNonNull(behaviorClass, BEHAVIOR_CLASS_MUST_NOT_BE_NULL);
370        checkArgument(behaviorClass.isAnnotationPresent(FacesBehavior.class),
371            "In order to work this method needs a ClientBehavior annotated with 'jakarta.faces.component.behavior.FacesBehavior', behaviorClass:"
372                + behaviorClass.getName());
373        return registerBehavior(behaviorClass.getAnnotation(FacesBehavior.class).value(), behaviorClass);
374    }
375
376    /**
377     * Register a composite component to be rendered.
378     *
379     * @param libraryName the library name like
380     *                    "http://xmlns.jcp.org/jsf/composite/" or "
381     * @param tagName     the tag name
382     * @param uiComponent the component that should be returned as mock /
383     *                    placeholder for the composite component
384     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
385     * fluent-api style usage
386     */
387    public ComponentConfigDecorator registerCompositeComponent(final String libraryName, final String tagName,
388                                                               final UIComponent uiComponent) {
389        if (!(application.getViewHandler() instanceof CuiMockViewHandler)) {
390            application.setViewHandler(new CuiMockViewHandler());
391        }
392        ((CuiMockViewHandler) application.getViewHandler()).registerCompositeComponent(libraryName, tagName,
393            uiComponent);
394        return this;
395    }
396
397    /**
398     * Add a component to the view root to be found when searching via
399     * {@link UIViewRoot#findComponent(String)}.
400     *
401     * @param expr      the expression the component should be found with
402     * @param component the component
403     * @return the {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} itself to enable a
404     * fluent-api style usage
405     */
406    public ComponentConfigDecorator addUiComponent(String expr, UIComponent component) {
407        if (!(facesContext.getViewRoot() instanceof CuiMockUIViewRoot)) {
408            facesContext.setViewRoot(new CuiMockUIViewRoot());
409        }
410        ((CuiMockUIViewRoot) facesContext.getViewRoot()).addUiComponent(expr, component);
411        return this;
412    }
413
414}
